name: Overdungeon - Mr.Almighty (Card Pack)
summary:
Overdungeon will release a DLC, containing a brand new card pack, Mr. Almighty on Thanksgiving!

This new pack features all manner of powerful Overload cards. No matter how many Overload you got in a turn, you can at least draw 2 cards next turn, which grants you the mighty force to smash the enemy in a single turn!
